title: Sweet Track | Bangkit Academy Capstone Project
description: An Android-based mobile application for diabetes management. The app features image-based food recognition, automated nutritional data extraction, daily calorie and sugar intake tracking, and an integrated chatbot that provides diabetes-related education and lifestyle guidance.

title: Text Skew Detection and Correction using Hough Transform
description: A simple website built with Python and Streamlit, designed to detect and correct skewed text in images using the Hough Transform algorithm. This project helps ensure that text images are properly aligned for easier reading or further processing
